nav.div: Leland Public School » News » What's New » Northern Michigan Resources - COVID-19

span.style: font-size: 14pt; background-color: transparent; font-weight: 700; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap; font-family: Arial;

p.span: Resources for Northern Michigan: COVID-19

span.style: font-size: 11pt; background-color: transparent; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap; font-family: Arial;

p.span: If you have a variety of needs or would like to connect with someone in person to help connect you with resources to meet your needs,

span.style: font-size: 11pt; background-color: transparent; font-weight: 700; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap; font-family: Arial;

p.span: please call 2-1-1.

span.style: font-size: 11pt; background-color: transparent; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap; font-family: Arial;

p.span:
They will ask lots of questions about your specific needs and then connect you to the resources available to support you and your family. They will also be able to connect you with social, emotional and mental health support. They are available 24/7.
Meal Programs Michigan Food Programs serving meals Apply for Free/Reduced Lunch programs: lunchapp.com
Michigan families can get food, cash, internet during coronavirus crisis

span.style: font-size: 11pt; background-color: transparent; font-weight: 700; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap; font-family: Arial;

p.span: Leelanau Christian Neighbors

span.style: font-size: 11pt; background-color: transparent; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap; font-family: Arial;

p.span: is another local resource that includes Blessings in a Backpack, Food Pantry, Baby Pantry and the Laundry Project. Please call

span.style: font-size: 11pt; background-color: transparent; font-weight: 700; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap; font-family: Arial;
font-size: 11pt; font-weight: 700; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap; font-family: Arial; color: rgb(68, 68, 68);

p.span: Northern Michigan Community Action Agency Meals on Wheels

span.style: font-size: 11pt; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap; font-family: Arial; color: rgb(68, 68, 68);

p.span: : Grand Traverse and Leelanau counties: Lisa Robitshek, Jennifer Watkins or David Hagen,

span.style: font-size: 11pt; font-weight: 700; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap; font-family: Arial; color: rgb(68, 68, 68);
font-size: 11pt; font-weight: 700; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap; font-family: Arial; color: rgb(68, 68, 68);

p.span: Father Fred Foundation

span.style: font-size: 11pt; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap; font-family: Arial; color: rgb(68, 68, 68);

p.span: will be offering food and emergency financial services only. Call the foundation on Tuesdays, Thursdays and Fridays from 10 a.m. to 2 p.m. and Wednesdays from 2-6 p.m. at

span.style: font-size: 11pt; font-weight: 700; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap; font-family: Arial; color: rgb(68, 68, 68);
font-size: 11pt; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap; font-family: Arial; color: rgb(68, 68, 68);

p.span: They greatly appreciate and continue to need financial donations.

span.style: font-size: 11pt; background-color: transparent; font-weight: 700; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap; font-family: Arial;

p.span: Community Connections

span.style: font-size: 11pt; background-color: transparent; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap; font-family: Arial;

p.span: is a FREE program offering connections to community resources for adults, children and families. Community Health Workers in your local health department will help you access community resources. Please call:

span.style: font-size: 11pt; background-color: transparent; font-weight: 700; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap; font-family: Arial;
font-size: 11pt; background-color: transparent; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap; font-family: Arial;
font-size: 11pt; background-color: transparent; font-weight: 700; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap; font-family: Arial;

p.span: United Way

span.style: font-size: 11pt; background-color: transparent; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap; font-family: Arial;

p.span: has a COVID-19 Economic Relief Fund providing help with bills, rent and food. You can call

span.style: font-size: 11pt; background-color: transparent; font-weight: 700; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap; font-family: Arial;
font-size: 11pt; background-color: transparent; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap; font-family: Arial;

p.span: and provide your zip code. They will give you a list of local agenices to provide assistance.

span.style: font-size: 11pt; background-color: transparent; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; text-decoration-line: underline; text-decoration-skip-ink: none; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap; font-family: Arial; color: rgb(17, 85, 204);
font-size: 11pt; background-color: transparent; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap; font-family: Arial;

font-size: 11pt; background-color: transparent; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap; font-family: Arial; color: rgb(74, 74, 74);

p.span: is a local organization specific for

span.style: font-size: 11pt; background-color: transparent; font-weight: 700; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap; font-family: Arial; color: rgb(74, 74, 74);

p.span: single moms

span.style: font-size: 11pt; background-color: transparent; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap; font-family: Arial; color: rgb(74, 74, 74);

p.span: needing financial assistance, emotional support or for

span.style: font-size: 11pt; background-color: transparent; font-weight: 700; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap; font-family: Arial; color: rgb(74, 74, 74);

p.span: community members

span.style: font-size: 11pt; background-color: transparent; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap; font-family: Arial; color: rgb(74, 74, 74);

p.span: who are willing to give financially to help meet the needs of these single moms. Please connect with and contact through the website or calling

span.style: font-size: 11pt; background-color: transparent; font-weight: 700; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap; font-family: Arial; color: rgb(74, 74, 74);

font-size: 11pt; background-color: transparent; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap; font-family: Arial; color: rgb(74, 74, 74);

p.span: or emailing

span.style: font-size: 11pt; background-color: transparent; font-weight: 700; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap; font-family: Arial; color: rgb(74, 74, 74);

p.span: info@singlemomm.org.

span.style: font-size: 11pt; background-color: transparent; font-weight: 700; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap; font-family: Arial;

p.span: Social/Emotional Health Supports:

li.style: list-style-type: disc; font-size: 11pt; font-family: Arial; background-color: transparent; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre;

ul.li: 24-hour mental health crisis line: 1-833-295-0616 (Northern Lake Community Mental Health-FAST)

li.style: list-style-type: disc; font-size: 11pt; font-family: Arial; background-color: transparent; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre;

ul.li: Crisis counselor text line (24/7, national service): text HOME to 741741

div.p: Leland High School does not discriminate on the basis of race, color, national origin, sex, age, or disability in admission to its programs, services, or activities, in access to them, in treatment of individuals, or in any aspect of their operations. The lack of English language skills shall not be a barrier to admission or participation in the district’s activities and programs. Leland High Public Schools also does not discriminate in its hiring or employment practices.
